name: HospitalMeasuresRadiologicalFindingsConsistentWithPneumonia
title: Hospital Measures-Radiological findings consistent with pneumonia

Bronchiolitis obliterans with usual interstitial pneumonitis (disorder)

T2:Lung tumor with any of these features:>3cm in greatest dimension, involves main bronchus >2cm distal to carina;invades visceral pleura;assoc with atelectasis/obstructive pneumonitis extends to hilar region, does not involve entire lung (finding)
T3: Lung tumor of any size associated atelectasis or obstructive pneumonitis of the entire lung (finding)

pT3:Tumor directly invades any of following:chest wall,diaphragm,mediastinal pleura,parietal pericardium;or tumor in main bronchus<2 cm distal to carina(not involving it);or assoc atelectasis or obstructive pneumonitis of whole lung (finding)
Atelectasis AND/OR obstructive pneumonitis of entire lung associated with direct extension of malignant neoplasm (finding)
Aspiration pneumonia due to regurgitated gastric secretions (disorder)
Aspiration pneumonia due to inhalation of vomitus (disorder)
Pneumonia due to Gram negative bacteria (disorder)
Pneumonia due to Severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus (disorder)
Pneumonia due to infection by Streptococcus pyogenes (disorder)
Finding of difference in opacity compared to previous radiologic examination (finding)
Aspiration pneumonia resulting from a procedure (disorder)
Cold agglutinin disease due to Mycoplasma pneumonia (disorder)
Influenza with respiratory manifestation other than pneumonia (disorder)
Aspiration pneumonia due to near drowning (disorder)
Aspiration pneumonia due to regurgitated food (disorder)
Aspiration pneumonia due to inhalation of milk (disorder)
Pneumonitis due to inhalation of essences (disorder)
